Title: Downbeat Data
Description:
You say that Tempo mentioned objects from other timelines?

I have a device used for syncing melodies. Strangely enough, it seems to have the same effect on timelines in this town. Perhaps a side effect of the chaotic temporal energies here?

I've upgraded Pedgi's glasses to allow him to observe the rhythms of the world. They may make it easier to find mis-timed entities. Ask if you can borrow them.
ObjectivesText: Use Melly's device near objects from other timelines. Pedgi's sunglasses will make them easier to find.

Objectives.Text: Banish Off-Beat Entities with Melly's Device
